thread.title: Two HVAC Veterans Promoted to Service GM at Tozour Energy Systems

author: cnbc.com
title: Two HVAC Veterans Promoted to Service GM at Tozour Energy Systems

organizations.name: hvac veterans promoted to service gm
main line chamber of commerce’s leadership program

text:
KOP-based building automation team promotes internally
KING OF PRUSSIA, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Tozour Energy Systems, a leading provider of HVAC and building automation systems, recently announced two promotions within its team. Marcy Guerra and Tara Leri, both longtime team members, have been promoted to Service General Manager.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180315005882/en/
Tozour Energy Systems announced the promotions of Marcy Guerra (left) and Tara Leri (right) to Service General Manager. (Photo: Business Wire)
Guerra’s territory is the city of Philadelphia and South Jersey, while Leri oversees the Pennsylvania suburbs; both individuals now have full profit-and-loss responsibility for their respective territories. Guerra and Leri are members of Mechanical Service Contractors of America, and have completed the MEA Leadership Advantage Certificate Program as well as the Main Line Chamber of Commerce’s Leadership Program.
“Our company invests heavily in our team’s success and growth so we can develop leadership that is consistent with our culture,” said Kevin Duffy, president of Tozour Energy Systems. “We are proud of Marcy and Tara and are confident that they will lead their teams to provide exceptional service to our clients as well as continue the outstanding growth performance in our service business!”
Marcy Guerra has been on the Tozour team since July 2006, beginning as a Service Resource Coordinator. Guerra showed continued dedication and success, resulting in quick advancement during her 11 years at Tozour. She most recently had service operations responsibility in the Area Service Manager role. As a member of MSCA, Guerra has been on the Service Managers Committee for three years. She is currently working toward an MBA from the Fox School of Business at Temple University.
Tara Leri began her career with Tozour as a Client Service Representative in August 2011. Leri demonstrated hard work and achievement during her six years with the company, which resulted in her being promoted to Area Service Supervisor and then Building Operations Service Manager. In her new role, Leri will retain Building Operations Services responsibility in addition to running all aspects of the service business in her territory.
ABOUT TOZOUR ENERGY SYSTEMS
Tozour Energy Systems is a full-service HVAC and building automation provider based in King of Prussia, Pennsylvania, and is a franchise of Trane, a business of Ingersoll Rand. The company provides customers with a diverse range of solutions, including building automation, equipment services, energy conservation services, green building design, controls, parts, supplies and responsible technical support throughout Pennsylvania and New Jersey. Named one of the “Best Places to Work” by the Philadelphia Business Journal, Tozour Energy Systems is a member of the Delaware Valley Green Building Council. For more information, visit tozourenergy.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180315005882/en/
